text: Igor Kalinin (born December 28, 1959) is a former Ukrainian politician who served as Advisor to the President of Ukraine from 2013–2014 and Head of the Security Service of Ukraine from 2012-2013. On March 5, 2014, the Council of the European Union froze the bank accounts of several Ukrainian politicians who are suspected of misusing budget funds, including Kalinin and former president Viktor Yanukovych, who Kalinin served as an advisor to. == References == Category:1959 births Category:Directors of the Security Service of Ukraine Category:Colonel Generals of Ukraine Category:Russian emigrants to Ukraine Category:Living people Category:People from Moscow Category:KGB officers
title: Ihor Kalinin (official)
